SELECT challenge.chnum, chname, chdonate, chdesc, chimg, chsuccess, chexp, chmaxp, chsdate, chedate, count(checknum) AS checknum, donatepay, donateco, challenge.nickname FROM donabit.challenge LEFT JOIN donabit.checks ON challenge.chnum = checks.chnum
WHERE chsdate <= DATE(NOW()) AND chedate >= DATE(NOW()) WHERE chsdate > DATE(NOW()) WHERE chedate < DATE(NOW())
AND chname LIKE concat('%', #{keyword},'%')
GROUP BY challenge.chnum ORDER BY chnum desc LIMIT #{mo.skip}, #{mo.amount}
select count(nickname) from challenging where chnum = #{chnum};
SELECT count(*) FROM donabit.challenging where challenging.nickname in (#{nickname}) and challenging.chnum like #{chnumdetail};
mapper.update: update challenge set viewcount=viewcount+1 where chnum = #{chnum};
mapper.select: select viewcount from challenge where chnum = #{chnum};

SELECT chname, checks.nickname, checks.checkid, checktitle, checkdesc, checkimg AS checkimg2, checktime, member.avatar, count(likes) as totallikes FROM checks left outer join member on checks.nickname = member.nickname left outer JOIN challenge ON checks.chnum = challenge.chnum left outer join toggle on checks.checkid = toggle.checkid
where chname like concat('%', #{keyword},'%')
group by checks.checkid
order BY checktime DESC
order BY totallikes DESC
LIMIT #{mo.skip}, #{mo.amount}
select count(chnum) from challenging where nickname = #{nickname};

SELECT challenging.nickname, challenging.chnum, challenge.chmaxp, (select count(challenging.chnum) from donabit.challenging where challenging.chnum like #{chnumajax} GROUP BY challenging.chnum)as nickname2 FROM donabit.challenging join donabit.challenge on challenge.chnum = challenging.chnum WHERE challenging.nickname LIKE #{nickname} and challenging.chnum LIKE #{chnumajax};
